a mark made by a foot or shoe
We followed the footprints of a deer in the snow.
the amount of space on a desk that a computer uses
PCs with a 50% smaller footprint than other models
the effect that a person’s or organization’s activities have on the environment
Answer these questions to calculate your business’s environmental footprint.
the space on the surface of a desk that is filled by a computer
These PCs have a 50% smaller footprint than previous models.
